segments.text: You wouldn't believe what I got in the mail today !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's a letter from Ray and Sue in Shanghai !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , I thought I'd wait until you got home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: go on , read it out loud .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok . It says , " Dear Jessica . It was so good to receive you letter . I sounds like you and Riley are settling into your new home with ease ... "
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: when did you send her a letter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: just a few weeks ago . Sue and I send letters to each other often .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know anyone did that any more . Ok , go on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok ... I'm going to have to skip over this section . It's girl-talk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh . It's actually all rather personal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , skip over all of that and read me the rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , it just says , ball , blah , blah ... " Ray and I look forward to seeing you in June . Write soon . With love , Sue . "
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: are we going to see them in June or are they coming to see us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: didn't I tell you ? We're going to Shanghai to stay with them in June .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , I guess I missed that .
segments.speaker: S2
